name: Cars, Buses and Lawnmowers
summary: Kirby learns about a character design contest featuring the ultimate prize - a chance to meet idol Mac McCallister and debut an animated character on TV. He plans to attend with Fish and Eli, but when they unexpectedly get stranded at school hours before the contest, they devise a plan that accidently places them in the middle of "Clown Town," an abandoned area of the city where creepy clowns reign. Meanwhile, Dawn realizes Kirby is using an embarrassing drawing of her titled "Dawnzilla" as his submission for the contest, so she and Belinda do everything in their power to stop him.

name: Flice of the Living Dead
summary: Kirby and his friends are excited that they're finally old enough to attend the annual "Forest Hills Ninth Annual Fright Night Film Festival." However, when their biology teacher accidentally breaks open a container of Forest Hills Super Flice, the principal quarantines Kirby's class within the school, ruining their chance to go. Meanwhile, Dawn and Belinda are psyched to be invited to a Halloween party at the house of one of the coolest boys in school, Evan.

name: The Legend of Prank Williams Jr.
summary: Kirby tries to replicate the most outrageous prank ever pulled.

name: The Year of Fridays
summary: Kirby is grounded and forced to camp out in the backyard with his dad. Meanwhile, Dawn tries to meet her favorite band.

name: Kirby Almighty
summary: When Kirby starts using a pen that appears to have magical powers, everything he draws suddenly starts coming to life.

name: Killer Puppies
summary: To avoid getting graded on a bad cooking project, Kirby fakes an illness and is sent to the nurse who takes his fabricated over-the-top symptoms seriously. When the school finds out he supposedly has a serious illness, they shower him with sympathy, gifts and host a fundraiser to raise money to help him get better leaving Kirby worried that his secret will be exposed.

name: Art Attack
summary: After being rejected from the school art fair, Kirby meets the leader of an underground group of artists and is immediately accepted into their ranks. Meanwhile, Dawn discovers Eli was once a toddler model.

name: Kirby's Choice
summary: Kirby wins tickets to a video game convention but can't decide on whether he should take Fish or Eli. To help make his decision, he envisions how the day might go with each of them. Dawn also takes part in the convention when she lands a job dressing up as a comic-book character.

name: Mac's Back
summary: Kirby's favorite show "Big Bald Oaf" has been cancelled leaving the series' creator Mac McCallister depressed. Kirby and his friends work to get the show back on the air.

name: Kick the Bucket
summary: Someone is defacing school property with cartoon murals and signing them with Kirby's name, getting him in trouble at school. Kirby and Dawn team up to solve the case.

name: It's a Brad, Brad, Brad, Brad World
summary: Kirby is ridiculed at school after causing a toilet to explode. To avoid being teased on the way home, Kirby and his friends venture into The Bradlands, a part of town that only Brads live, and stumble upon buttons which he uses in an attempt to win over the school.

name: Gimme Some Room
summary: When a spare room becomes available in the Buckets household, Kirby and Dawn have different ideas on the best way to use it. After Kirby makes Pearly Todd look like a fool in front of the whole school, Kirby agrees to set Todd up on a date with Dawn.

name: Day of the Cat
summary: Principal Mitchell enlists Kirby's help to draw a portrait of his celebrity cat, Laughy Cat. Meanwhile, Dawn gets a card on her locker from a secret admirer.

name: The Rise and Fall of 4th Period
summary: Kirby becomes the leader of his class after his teacher leaves, creating a fun and chaotic classroom. Dawn and Belinda go on a hygiene strike after the Principal bans hair-dryers.

name: The Hurt Box
summary: When Kirby's underground comic book that mocks Forest Hills' teachers is accidently put in the school's suggestion box, Kirby, Fish and Eli devise a plan to steal it back before it's too late.

name: Get a Grip
summary: Kirby, Eli and Fish are hard at work on their project for the science fair -- creating the Ultimate High Five. Kirby suffers an injury while working on the project that constrains his creative outlet and forces him to start acting out like his characters.

name: All Hands on Dexter
summary: Kirby and Fish enter a contest to see who can keep his or her hands on a video game the longest. Meanwhile, Mr. Buckets wants to cash in his "Chore Day" coupon from five years ago.

name: The Av Kid
summary: Kirby needs a video of him losing a rap-battle to his mom taken down from the internet, so he enlists a member of the AV Club to help. Dawn becomes obsessed with bubble wrap.

name: The Mother of All Lies
summary: Kirby and Dawn's mom accepts a job as a substitute teacher at school. Dawn makes her mom promise not to know her while Kirby does the opposite and never leaves her side.

name: Send in the Clowns
summary: Kirby gets a golden opportunity to animate and shoot a commercial, but his creativity is hobbled when Wild Gil demands that the commercial include a clown.

name: Failure to Launch
summary: Kirby launches his own web channel named Kirblammo.

name: The Gil in My Life
summary: Kirby launches his own web channel named Kirblammo, but Dawn, tired of always being overshadowed, hijacks his channel to try and ruin his big day.

name: War and Pizza
summary: When Kirby's parents go out, they leave behind a list of rules to follow. Kirby orders pizza, but when the pizza delivery guy shows up and asks for a tip, Kirby, Fish and Eli don't have enough money. The delivery guy then proceeds to hack the Bucket's television and threatens to break his parents rules unless they confess and admit to lies they've told in the past. Meanwhile, breaking one of her parents rules about not leaving the house, Dawn (with Belinda in tow) attempts to get revenge on a girl named Rebecca for taking her dress in gym (forcing her to wear a soccer bag for the rest of the day) by bringing a bag of animal poop. When it turns out that Rebecca is actually very nice, and took her dress by mistake, she tries to leave with her "purse" (the bag of dung), but a series of events prevent her from doing so.

name: Balloonacy!
summary: Kirby thinks one of his new teachers is a clown but no one believes him.

name: It's a Kirbyful Life
summary: Kirby is frustrated with how many Christmas gifts he's been asked to illustrate and makes the wish that he never knew how to draw.

name: I, Gregory
summary: Everyone blames Kirby when Principal Mitchell introduces a strict robot named Gregory to be the new hall monitor.

name: Weekend with Inga
summary: Kirby's at the mercy of his great-grandma, Inga, when she babysits for the weekend and makes Kirby destroy all of his characters except for her favorite, Scrunch Face.

name: Ripper Impossible
summary: Kirby decides to put a stop to Dave the Ripper's bullying by running a heist to steal "The Mitchell Files" and using the info to take Dave down.

name: Kirby to the Max
summary: Kirby gets sent to Maximum Saturday Detention where he encounters a warden even harsher than Principal Mitchell.

name: Oh, Bros, Where Art Thou?
summary: After a prank gets Eli and Fish banned from hanging with Kirby, they attempt to have fun without him.

name: Twinsies
summary: When students from another school transfer to Forest Hills High, Kirby is excited at the chance to gain new followers, but instead faces off with Bucky who also has a web channel.

name: Say Uncle
summary: Kirby makes up for lost time with the fun-loving uncle his mom forbade him to see.

name: When Mitchell Met Dad
summary: Kirby is living the good life when his dad and Principal Mitchell become best buds, until his dad unexpectedly ditches Mitchell.

name: Mitchell's Gauntlet
summary: When Mitchell takes Kirby's tablet with his mom's birthday surprise, he takes up the sword and enters Mitchell's gauntlet in order to get it back.

name: Call of Doodie
summary: After Kirby finds something unexpected in his backyard that helped found Forest Hills, the Mayor decides to tear down the Buckets house to build a memorial.

name: Tunnel Babies
summary: Dawn and Kirby discover they made national news as toddlers when they were stuck in the town's tunnels.

name: Me Time: The Ballad of Mac and Mom
summary: When Kirby finds out that his mom and Mac McAllister are sworn enemies, he travels back in time to set things right.

name: Battle of the Ballot
summary: Kirby, burdened with an overly harsh Mitchell sentence, tries to get Eli or Fish to win the school presidential election so one of them can pardon him.

name: The Goods
summary: To overcome a severe case of artists' block, Kirby is hypnotized and goes inside his own mind to try and find if he has the "goods.".

name: Yep, This is Happening
summary: When their parents disappear through a portal to an alternate universe, Kirby and Dawn embark on a long and outrageous journey to find them.

name: Bad Seed
summary: Kirby and his friends find themselves in a bizarre alternate dimension where "rotten" kids are mulched and then regrown to be fresh versions of themselves.

name: Queen for a Dawn
summary: Kirby and Dawn enter a medieval dimension where Dawn is queen of the land, and Kirby is banished to the dungeon.

name: Forest Hills Blues
summary: Kirby discovers he and Mitchell are partners on the Forest Hills police force and are assigned to take down a pair of robbers who just might be Kirby's parents.

name: Cool Chad
summary: Kirby and Dawn search for their parents in a dimension where adults are not allowed.

name: The Unpranked
summary: Kirby, Eli, and Fish take the orb on a pranking joy ride and end up in a dimension ruled by Prank Williams Jr.

name: Commander Kirbo
summary: Captain Kirbo and his space crew face off against the galaxy's most feared overlord, Dark Mitchell.

name: Dr. Mac ‘n Cheese's Labyrinth of Horrors
summary: When the Buckets family uses the orb to take their annual family vacation in another dimension, they find themselves in a labyrinth run by Fish's old guinea pig, Mr. Mac N' Cheese.

name: Closing Time
summary: When Kirby overuses the orb, rifts begin opening all over Forest Hills allowing all kinds of dimensional trouble.

name: A Tale of Two Kirbys
summary: Commando Kirbo makes his way into Kirby's world in an attempt to stop Lord Mitchell once and for all.

name: That Sinking Feeling
summary: Banished by Dark Mitchell to a desolate dimension, Kirby, Fish, Eli, Dawn and Belinda match wits with theater kids gone mad from toxic volcano gas.

name: Orbed and Dangerous
summary: In an effort to grow more powerful, Lord Mitchell sends his dark minions to other dimensions to retrieve more orbs. In one of those dimensions, he encounters NBA athlete John Wall (Washington Wizards) where the two go head-to-head and discover why Lord Mitchell is obsessed with dunking.

name: Yep, Still Happening
summary: While Lord Mitchell gains power from orbs retrieved by his minions, Kirby prepares himself for battle by training to be a gatekeeper with Mitchell Prime.
